type.name: big5han
type.description: Pinyin ordering for Latin, big5 charset ordering for CJK characters (used in Chinese)

type.name: dict
type.description: Dictionary style ordering (such as in Sinhala)

type.name: direct
type.description: Binary code point order (used in Hindi)

type.name: ducet
type.description: The default Unicode collation element table order

type.name: gb2312
type.description: Pinyin ordering for Latin, gb2312han charset ordering for CJK characters (used in Chinese)

type.name: phonebk
type.description: Phonebook style ordering (such as in German)

type.name: phonetic
type.description: Phonetic ordering (sorting based on pronunciation)

type.name: pinyin
type.description: Pinyin ordering for Latin and for CJK characters (used in Chinese)

type.name: reformed
type.description: Reformed ordering (such as in Swedish)

type.name: search
type.description: Special collation type for string search

type.name: searchjl
type.description: Special collation type for Korean initial consonant search

type.name: standard
type.description: Default ordering for each language

type.name: stroke
type.description: Pinyin ordering for Latin, stroke order for CJK characters (used in Chinese)

type.name: trad
type.description: Traditional style ordering (such as in Spanish)

type.name: unihan
type.description: Pinyin ordering for Latin, Unihan radical-stroke ordering for CJK characters (used in Chinese)

key.name: ka
key.description: Collation parameter key for alternate handling

type.name: noignore
type.description: Variable collation elements are not reset to ignorable

type.name: shifted
type.description: Variable collation elements are reset to zero at levels one through three

key.name: kb
key.description: Collation parameter key for backward collation weight

type.name: true
type.description: The second level to be backwards

type.name: false
type.description: No backwards (the second level to be forwards)

key.name: kc
key.description: Collation parameter key for case level

type.name: true
type.description: The case level is inserted in front of tertiary

type.name: false
type.description: No special case level handling

key.name: kf
key.description: Collation parameter key for ordering by case

type.name: upper
type.description: Upper case to be sorted before lower case

type.name: lower
type.description: Lower case to be sorted before upper case

type.name: false
type.description: No special case ordering

key.name: kh
key.description: Collation parameter key for special Hiragana handling

type.name: true
type.description: Hiragana to be sorted before all non-variable on quaternary level

type.name: false
type.description: No special handling for Hiragana

type.name: true
type.description: Convert text into Normalization Form D before calculating collation weights

type.name: false
type.description: Skip normalization

key.name: kn
key.description: Collation parameter key for numeric handling

type.name: true
type.description: A sequence of decimal digits is sorted at primary level with its numeric value

type.name: false
type.description: No special handling for numeric ordering

type.name: REORDER_CODE
type.description: One or more collation reorder codes: LDML 5.14.12)

key.name: ks
key.description: Collation parameter key for collation strength

type.name: level1
type.description: The primary level

type.name: level2
type.description: The secondary level

type.name: level3
type.description: The tertiary level

type.name: level4
type.description: The quaternary level

type.name: identic
type.description: The identical level

key.name: vt
key.description: Collation parameter key for variable top

type.name: CODEPOINTS
type.description: The variable top (one or more Unicode code points: LDML Appendix Q)
